QuestData.Title: The Nightmare Lord
QuestData.Description: You arrived just in time, friend.$b$bKagraxxis was moments away from sacrificing me to his master... I was certain I would perish.$b$bI am grateful, but we are not out of danger yet... Xavius has returned.$b$bThe Nightmare Lord is here in Val'sharah, personally orchestrating the corruption of this land. My captor revealed as much to me before I was to be sacrificed.$b$bWe must find Thaon Moonclaw and inform him before it is too late!
QuestData.LogDescription: Inform Thaon Moonclaw of the return of Xavius.
QuestData.RewardText: Thaon Moonclaw was a great druid and a true protector of this land.$b$bHow can we hope to defeat the Nightmare Lord without him fighting beside us?
